page.title: 16 THE TOWN'S ATTRACTIONS
page.content: Many friends and relations come here for their{holidays.}It is a good centre for hotels,{sports}and{leisure but few tourists use it as a centre. The main attractions are the{historic {buildings;}the{castle}was among those built by William The Conqueror soon after the Battle of Hastings.It is well preserved and we love the{view}of town and{countryside}from the top even though it's a hard climb up.In parts of the town are remains of the town wall,best seen in the{Southgate Arch } which once housed the South gate,then was used as a prison,then as a museum and now is an art shop.Our beautiful priory suffered at the hand of Henry V111's troops and stones from it can be seen in some of Launceston's walls! {St.Mary's Church}is renowned for its carved granite(there being a sad cause for this)and its Black Prince tower.
